post.body: deep ha! hahahahaha! i cant believe you called it deep. falls over dead from laughing!
the Internet scares me. and dont lie to me. ive seen disconnected!
the internet says im the best looking merlin EVER! also the internet has many pictures of you half naked. you should be ashamed!
but where would you find such a thing? a better looking merlin: LOL!
i would want a pretty one. it would be good for the show to have two good looking leads!
anthony doesnt like you anymore now that he had to carry you halfway through france. he would vote for a lighter arthur
true you are the damsel in distress while me = obviously the hero!
true...they'd be cutting his head off rather than hanging him.
I'm sure there is someone I can tell. the twitter police for example!
at least you didnt call yourself PrinceBradley. stop bullying me now! or i will tell someone!
if you tell any of this to capps I will share with him the dirtiest Arthur/Uther story I can find!
went to the store. peed on a stick. as you do. congratz you are a dad!
how dare u ask me that?! U calling me a slut?
the internet also has me being pregnant. OMG! the internet is filled with insanity!
who told you that? that is a total lie!
well you know enough about that for both of us, eh?
really, I just want to see you ask her. and your face right now!!!
you should ask Katie about that...just saying. also, who really wants to make out with girls...
steps away from the google...
being bullied by james now online as well. make note to let agent know. maybe arthur can die next season. show is called MERLIN!
This picture taking is fun! http://twitpic.com/t6tu
at least i know how to use text in photoshop. And how to take pictures http://twitpic.com/t6sf
this is useless information sharing I guess. maybe itll be fun n/n?
relaxing if you can believe it. google is my enemy! pretending it doesnt exist.
They wanted me to. and then they heard me sing... oh well, next year then
I also was the cutest cat thing ever! It's all in the method acting!
OMG! Bradley is in luuuuurve with Tony. HaHaHaHaHaHaHaHaHa!!! I will so tell him that. Ha, I knew u had the buffy dvds for a reason!
I guess that means not pregnant....right? http://twitpic.com/tklw
i think this will be the best for all of us. And we will never speak of this again!!!
is not reading any of this!
Has short time memory loss and has already forgotten what bradley is talking about...
is still laughing.
is sure you cant!
is looking around innocently...
is rotfl!!!!1!!
